TMDA Configuration Overview

  1. First read the Pre-Configuration section for changes you might need to make to non-TMDA software such as your SMTP-server.

  2. Next read the Server Configuration section for how to filter incoming messages on your mailserver with TMDA.

  3. If you want to customize your TMDA auto responses, read the TMDA Template HOWTO.

  4. If you want to tag outgoing messages from your mail or news client, then read the Client Configuration section.

  5. If you want to customize your TMDA installation, read the Configuration Variables reference. This is also highly recommended reading if you want to get a better sense of TMDA's capabilities and features.

  6. Reading the TMDA FAQ is also recommended for a better understanding of TMDA.

  7. If you are upgrading from an earlier release of TMDA, see the upgrade instructions.

  8. Finally, consider joining one or more of the mailing lists to stay current with TMDA.

  9. If you decide to use TMDA in a product or service offering, consider adding your name to the In Use page.

  10. If you find TMDA useful, consider making a donation.
